DataSourcePortable.Name: EXACT_FASE_DESCARTADO
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT FASEEXACT,
 (
 SELECT COUNT(FASEEXACT)
 FROM K_CRM_PESSOAS B
 WHERE B.FASEEXACT = A.FASEEXACT AND EXACTDESCARTADO = 'N'
 ) ATIVOS,
 (
 SELECT COUNT(FASEEXACT)
 FROM K_CRM_PESSOAS B
 WHERE B.FASEEXACT = A.FASEEXACT AND EXACTDESCARTADO = 'S'
 ) DESCARTADOS
FROM K_CRM_PESSOAS A
WHERE FASEEXACT IS NOT NULL AND FASEEXACT <> 'DESCARTADOS'
GROUP BY FASEEXACT
" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="FASEEXACT" From="A" Path="FASEEXACT" /> <Field Alias="ATIVOS" From="A" Path="ATIVOS" /> <Field Alias="DESCARTADOS" From="A" Path="DESCARTADOS" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
